Co-op program overview The 13-week Cognizant Co-op this Fall is more than just an average work term. Forget business as usual. We pursue some of the world's most exciting, groundbreaking technologies; inspired solutions that improve the lives of millions across the globe. Our workplace thrives on ideas and opportunities. Everyone is encouraged to challenge convention - and that's where you come in! What you'll do During your co-op with Cognizant, you will: Learn: your journey begins with 6-weeks of customized, world class training in areas such as GenAI, Java/.Net Full Stack. Upon completion, you will not only be ready to apply these skills to a real-world challenge at Cognizant, but you'll also be able leverage this experience to succeed in the classroom, and beyond. Code: along with other top Canadian students, you will join our virtual AI Lab and work on building an exciting proof of concept by designing the architecture, preparing a detailed design and prototyping a solution where possible. Your project will culminate in a capstone project presentation to our Leadership team. Discover: with frequent networking, guidance and mentorship from members of our BU and Corporate teams, you can explore your passion for technology and AI beyond the borders of the co-op and identify the perfect career opportunity for you at Cognizant after you graduate.
